# include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    const int s=10001;
    int t;
    int i,n,b,count,min;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int a[s]={0};
    cin>>n;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>b;
        a[b]++;
    }
    count=a[1];
    min=1;
    for(i=1;i<s;i++)
    {
        if(count<a[i])
        {
            count=a[i];
            min=i;
        }
    }
    cout<<min<<" "<<count<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
